'''''Summit of Wisdom''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to reach the highest point in [[Sumeru City]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The highest point is on a tree branch above the [[Sanctuary of Surasthana]]. It is directly to the right of the tree branch with the [[Dendroculus]] on it.
